Container.Name: GitLab CE
Container.Overview: gitlab/gitlab-ce[br][br] GitLab Community Edition is a software development collaboration tool.[br][br] This software let's you commit and pull changes from a shared repository.[br][br] After you setup the server, repository will be available at the address [br][br] [br][br] [br][br] Features:[br][br] * [br][br] * [br][br] * [br][br] * [br][br] [span style=\'color: #E80000;\']DO THIS BEFORE DEPLOYING THE TEMPLATE[br][br] [/span] create a /mnt/user/gitlab directory.[br] unRAID Example:[br] docker run -d --restart=always --net=bridge --name playmaker -p 5000:5000 -v /mnt/disks/DataDisk/data/fdroid:/data/fdroid -e PGID=100 -e PUID=99 nomore201/playmaker

Config.Name: Config directory
Config.Description: Host path to store Fdroid apk files.

Config.Name: Run with user ID
Config.Description: Run application with specified user id.

Config.Name: Run with group ID
Config.Description: Run application with specified group id.
